typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> LecturaADL
source(output(
		FSK as integer,
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ROWHASH as string,
		FECHACREACION as timestamp,
		FECHAACTUALIZACION as timestamp,
		ACTUALIZACIONESAPLICADAS as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LecturaDW
LecturaADL derive(ROWHASH = sha1(512,ProductCategoryID,Name,rowguid,ModifiedDate)) ~> CalcularRowHash
CalcularRowHash, SelectRowHash exists(CalcularRowHash@ROWHASH == SelectRowHash@ROWHASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NuevoActualizado
LecturaDW select(mapColumn(
		ROWHASH
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRowHash
LecturaDW select(mapColumn(
		ProductCategoryID,
		FECHACREACION,
		FECHAACTUALIZACION,
		ACTUALIZACIONESAPLICADAS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLlave
NuevoActualizado, SelectLlave lookup(LecturaADL@ProductCategoryID == SelectLlave@ProductCategoryID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> BuscarExistencia
BuscarExistencia derive(ACTUALIZACIONESAPLICADAS = iif( isNull( ACTUALIZACIONESAPLICADAS ), 0, ACTUALIZACIONESAPLICADAS + 1),
		FECHACREACION = iifNull(FECHACREACION, currentUTC('America/Bogotá'), FECHACREACION),
		FECHAACTUALIZACION = currentUTC('America/Bogotá')) ~> AdicionColumnasComunes
AdicionColumnasComunes alterRow(insertIf(isNull(SelectLlave@ProductCategoryID)),
	updateIf(!isNull(SelectLlave@ProductCategoryID))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		FSK as integer,
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ROWHASH as string,
		FECHACREACION as timestamp,
		FECHAACTUALIZACION as timestamp,
		ACTUALIZACIONESAPLICADAS as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ProductCategoryID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategoryID = LecturaADL@ProductCategoryID,
		Name,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate,
		ROWHASH,
		FECHACREACION,
		FECHAACTUALIZACION,
		ACTUALIZACIONESAPLICADAS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CargarRegistros
